verses.content: In that day you will say: "Lord, I will praise you. You were angry with me. But your anger is gone now. You have made me feel better."
God saves me. I will trust him and not be afraid. The Lord Jehovah gives me strength. He is my song. He has saved me.
You will be happy when you get water from the wells of salvation.
In that day you will say: "Praise the Lord! Call on his name! Tell people what he has done. Help them remember that his name is great."
Sing to the Lord! He has done wonderful things. Everyone on earth knows this.
Call out! Shout, you people of Zion! The Holy One of Israel is great. He is with you.
